titleStmt.title: A proclamation, prorogating the dyets of giving in lists of poleable persons, and payment of their pole-money, and prescribing methods for the exactness and perfecting of the same.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms in ornamental border at head of text; initial letter.
Dated at end: Edinburgh, the nineteenth day of December, and of our reign the seventh year, 1695.
Signed: Gilb. Eliot Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Imperfect: cropped at foot; imprint lost.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.

person.persName: the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson
